articles.author: Carly Thomas
articles.title: Wendy Williams Breaks Silence on Aphasia and Dementia Diagnosis: “Immense Gratitude” - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "I continue to need personal space and peace to thrive. Please just know that your positivity and encouragement are deeply appreciated," said Williams in a rare statement, shared by her rep on Friday.
articles.content:
Wendy Williams is speaking out for the first time following her recent primary progressive aphasia and frontotemporal dementia diagnosis (FTD).
A representative for the former talk show host shared … [+2661 chars]
